items.stem: Which authority leads food safety enforcement in the UK?
items.rationale: Environmental Health Officers inspect and enforce food safety law.

items.stem: What document demonstrates your HACCP system is in control?
items.rationale: Signed daily records prove critical limits were monitored.

items.stem: If you spot unsafe food, what should you do first?
items.rationale: Isolate and report so contaminated food cannot be served.

items.stem: Food handlers must understand their legal duties becauseâ€¦
items.rationale: Individuals can face enforcement action if they neglect safe practice.

items.stem: Select the due diligence records inspectors expect to see.
items.rationale: Only documented, signed records and supplier assurances are accepted evidence.

items.stem: Who decides how frequently your business is inspected?
options: The Environmental Health Officer using risk scoring
items.rationale: EHOs assign a risk score based on compliance and history to set visit frequency.
